output:
Where do you come from?
In my right head
Where are you from?
From this country that you've seen
From a legend I see
No touch, no words
Dreams, reality breaks
Where do I come from?
I'm so blue
While I'm watching you
The lights blind me
No touch, no words
Dreams, reality breaks
We are now, you know
Sitting in this room
Looking into your eyes
Quietly I came over to you
Told to die in front of you
